text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 53.1. Qasam hai sitarey ki jab woh girey 53.2. Kay tumharey sathi ney na raah gum ki hai na woh terhi raah per hai 53.3. Aur na woh apni khuwaish say koi baat kehtay hain 53.4. Woh to sirf wahi hai jo utari jaati hai
